ground_truth: Each leg of the right triangle is a side of one of the squares.  Therefore, the legs of the right triangle have lengths $\sqrt{25}=5$ and $\sqrt{144}=12$, so the area of the triangle is $\frac12(5)(12) = \boxed{30}$.
